categories: Category:Star Wars: Meet the Heroes and Villains

nodes.text: Star Wars: Meet the Heroes and Villains Boxset

The Star Wars: Meet the Heroes and Villains Boxset is a young-reader collection from DK Publishing in the Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures series. The collected books include Star Wars: Meet the Villains: Darth Vader, Star Wars: Meet the Heroes: R2-D2, Star Wars: Meet the Heroes: Chewbacca, and Star Wars: Meet the Villains: Stormtroopers. It was released on October 29, 2019.
